name: OverFeed
description:
Here is a project carried out in the second year of my Video Game Design and Production training.

Made in early 2019 as a team of 3, it's a 4 players party game.

Every player plays a Food Truck that competes against all the others.

The goal is to honor the biggest amount of orders, by stealing ingredients before the others can use them.

Here some screenshots ---->

The team : 

Anna Deleforge : 3D / DA / Game Design/ UI (https://sites.google.com/view/anna-deleforge-portfolio/accueil )

Sadri Bechraoui : Programmation / Game Design / Sound Design (https://sadri01.itch.io/)

Sarah Zabinski : DA / Game Design
